title: He [sic] begynneth an interlocucyon, with an argument, betwyxt man and woman & whiche of them could proue to be most excelle[n]t.
author: Alexis, Guillaume, d. 1468?
notes: Place of publication and publication date from STC; printer's name from colophon.
Printer's device (McKerrow 19) on verso of A6, final leaf.
Translated from "Le debat de l'ōme et de la fēme" by Guillaume Alexis .--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
